rooms.description: Serves as the primary entry point and transitional space.
Open-plan living area with minimalist design elements. Includes seating and entertainment zones.
Adjacent to the kitchen with subtle partitioning for privacy.
Modern minimalist kitchen with an integrated dining area.
Basic functionality room for guests, incorporating sustainable materials.
Area designated for storage and household utilities.
Dedicated workout space with minimalistic design and proper ventilation.

openings.description: Large double door entrance ensuring accessibility in accordance with local norms and Vastu principles.
Spacious balcony for each bedroom, designed to maximize light and air flow as per minimalist aesthetics and Vastu guidelines.

notes: This design proposal is based on minimalistic principles with careful consideration of Vastu principles where applicable. Further detailed site planning and structural engineering input would be required for finalization.
